text: Great veteran owned company! Made the rental experience worth going back.

name: Tommy Vaughan
text: Wonderful experience with Hunter Livery. Totally professional well-dressed driver and on time for each pickup and drop off. It's nice to see a business go the extra mile for you. Will be calling Hunter again for our next "night out on the town" in Mobile, Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Vaughan for the 5 star review, we look forward to serving your future business travel needs!

name: Sam Pomier
text: This place has amazing customer service!  Very professional and prompt in communication. Would highly recommend to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to serve you at your wedding! Thank you for the 5 star review, we wish you the best!

name: Marcie Edwards
text: Hunter Livery is awesome. Their vehicle fleet is well maintained. Their drivers are always polite, punctual, and professional.  And, they always go above and beyond to take care of their clients!  I highly recommend their services.

resp.text: Mrs Edwards,  Thank you for your review, it was a pleasure serving you at the wedding! We look forward to any opportunity to serve you in the future!

name: Daniel Nichols
text: My wife and I used Hunter Limousine on our wedding day to get her and her bridesmaids from Mobile to the Grand Hotel, then on to Oak Hollow Farm. All I can say is William is a class act and we could not have asked for better service. He was extremely professional, timely, courteous and also helpful when we needed to add additional services. I highly recommend.

resp.text:
Mr Nichols,

Thank you for allowing us to be a part of your wedding, and thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your experience!

name: John Wolf
text:
TLDR: Double booked my wedding car after assuring me it was available.

I booked the 1950 Chevy as a wedding get-away car over a month ago, after calling to confirm availability because I knew there were a lot of weddings our particular weekend in Mobile. After confirming the availability, I immediately booked online as I felt more secure using the online portal to give payment information. I was assured the vehicle and driver would be in place at least thirty minutes before pickup.

I received a call 9 days before the wedding from the owner, informing me that they had another reservation earlier that night, and he didn't think the timing would work out.  I find it exceptionally unprofessional that the booking was confirmed beforehand (the online booking portal specifically requires a confirmation). No bride expecting a vintage automobile as a getaway will ever be satisfied with an Escalade as an alternative.

name: Jonathan Bolson
text: Punctual Professional service, with a beautiful fleet to choose from

resp.text: Thank you, Mr Bolson, we are glad you were happy with the service and look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Alexandria Adams
text: Called to try and get a taxi ride, was going over details with friends and asked how long it will take to get to us, as we were looking at other ride services trying to find the fastest route. He cussed at me and hung up in my face. Went with lyft instead and had a much better experience

name: Erica Asble
text: Our driver was super nice, picked us up even though we were staying in the not so tourist part of town on a busy night. Give them a call first, and if there is a wait. I suggest to take it they we be there, and won't give you the "I'll be there in 15......" an hour later your still waiting...

name: Tommy Miller
text: Whatever man works customer service should be fired instantly. I didn’t know the address of where we were going and I asked for a second to look it up and he said “oh my god....” then hung up. Once Uber and Lyft reach this town, good luck.

name: Christy Czapla
text: Best taxi service in the area!!! These guys are AMAZING!!! They arrived with smiles and on time. Could not ask for better service. I HIGHLY recommend. I manage a hotel in the area and my guest and I always use Modern Taxi. We know we won't be disappointed. Thank you so much for always being there and providing top notch service! :)

name: Wes Fulgham
text: These guys are the best taxi service that I have ever used!  I live in a college town and I use taxis all the time, but I have never come across a company like this!  They are super responsive and always on time.  They even give great advice for restaurants and bars!  If you need a taxi... only call them.  You will love them as well.

name: Spenser Frank
text: Reserved the party bus and MAN was it a fun night! The new look with the fresh interior was awesome! The limo wrap seating had us all able to laugh and talk and we almost forgot we were en route to the bars! Great night! Quality service! Love them!

name: Jennifer Daniels
text: I love this taxi service!!!!! During our stay we had woman, named Haley, and she was fantastic. Take us where we needed to go and very helpful the following day with recommending places to go and taking us there. Always on time. Her boyfriend is a driver as well and we enjoyed our time with!!! You guys are great! I HIGHLY reccommend them.

name: Allisa Belcher
text:
Brian was awesome. He was able to tell us where all the awesome places were in Gulf Shores. He picked us up from our condo,
Brought us to dinner, then to another bar and then home. Brian was nothing but pleasant to talk to the entire time. Such great customer service! Another plus is he is a retired serviceman! Support our veterans!

name: Paul Saputo
text: We called this guy, he promised to come to pick us up in 30 minutes. He didn't come and never answered the phone again. As it turns out, we found out from people that he has this reputation. If you have less than 4 people he will promise to pick you up and then not come.

text: My boyfriend and I had an amazing time thanks to Modern Taxi.  They were prompt and attentive and always on time.  Thank you so much to Haley and Steve our two favorite drivers.

name: matt long
text: Great service. These Guys come highly recommend and now I see why. Thank you.

name: sarah hunter
text: Awesome...thanks Haley...great service..come on guys share..honest dependable and tolerate of Dog...

name: B Chev
text: Great service. Best drivers in this zip code.

name: Timothy Bond (Your Publishing Partner)
text: The guy who answered  the phone was sarcastic and acted aggitated that I even called. Told me he would have a driver to me in 20 minutes. The driver never came. As i post this 90 minutes after i called. They dont even deserve the 1 star im giving them.

name: Misty White
text: Always fast and professional!  I always choose Modern!

name: Connie Drake
text: What a rip off used this service to go from Gulf Shores to floraBama this weekend and was ripped off driver didn't even run the Meter state's it was broke 45$ for 2 people !! Won't use this company again !!! There meters are over calculated it's a scam company!

resp.text: Our rates go by the stated rates posted in our taxis.  I am sorry if you feel that you were over charged.  But none of our meters are broken so you may have taken another company.

name: Jason Thomas
text: Rip off

name: Majestic Jamaica
text: Horrible Taxi Service, and Racist!

name: Robert McGoey
text: Tiger Limousine is our go-to for special event transportation.  I have used the service for holiday tours of area Christmas lights and for special birthday dinners, and using Tiger Limo always enhances our enjoyment of the event.  The drivers are punctual and professional, and the service offers a good value for the price.   Highly recommend.

name: Dana Rogers
text: My husband rented a limo for our 25th anniversary. He wanted the night to be fabulous for us. We had a 2 hour drive to the restaurant we chose for the evening and decided it would be so nice to have a limo take us so we could enjoy our time together. When the limo came and we entered into the limo the car was disgusting. Apparently they had taken prom students over the weekend and our date was on Tuesday. It seems no one could clean the car between the the 2. The radio was broken the windows were all smeared up, glitter all over and the floors had mud on them. There was a knife with cake icing on it sticking out of the seat which in turn got icing on my dress. The driver was okay and drove very well  but the car was absolutely horrible. We were tempted to just cancel and drive ourselves but we had paid ahead of time and were afraid we wouldn’t get our money back.

name: Marianne McCarley
text: Tiger Limousine is the best service in the Auburn area. We've used them for years. Brett always takes care of us. He's courteous and always has an interesting story for us. Would recommend!

name: Marianne McCarley
text: I love this company, and rave about it every chance I get! Very professional and always go the extra mile as they did for my birthday party. This company is my go-to for all my family’s special events in Auburn/ Opelika!

name: Sam Cooper
text: Great service. A lot cheaper than the other companies I called. I would recommend this company because of how easy it was to book.

name: Bobby Lancaster
text: Great limo service.  Provided us with charter buses to transport our guests then a nice get away limo for the bride and groom. On time and clean.

name: Mifune's Life
text: Want to give a  BIG thanks to Paul, our driver for his patience!!  Would request him next time!!

text: This crook overcharged me $30 for 1.3 miles .once I made it to my truck the taxi driver became aggressive in a threatening tone saying to stay in his taxi until I pay him.I asked him ,how was I going to pay him if I need to grabbed the money out the truck .this guy is a crook and violent and should not be trusted unless you want him to con you out your money and make you feel unsafe while riding with him.he looks homeless and like he sleep in his vehicle

I highly recommend Prestige Limousine Service of Tuscaloosa when you need to be somewhere important, and need a company you can trust.

I did, and things I could not predict happened on our side, and they stayed with us!

From our driver to the owner, who worked with me directly also, I had a great experience.  This is our go-to company.

You will not regret hiring them!

He did everything just right and even helped me get my blindfolded boyfriend to the limo door...while holding an umbrella for us, which he didn't have to do! The driver was a great sport and Barry was very down to earth, professional and helpful. Customer service was a ten out of ten, and I would totally recommend Prestige Limo Service to any and everyone. Unforgettable night and totally worth the price!

resp.text: 🥰 Thanks for that wonderful review!! Anthony Thomas was the driver that night. Top notch Chauffeur!!

text:
Prestige Limo truly provides a world class service.  i have not needed a limo or car service in the Tuscaloosa area sadly for a while, since my Mama's death, but I am now booking several trips for a happy occasion - my nieces wedding!
After contacting Prestige Limo of Tuscaloosa for wedding car service arrangements I remembered I wanted to review and recommend Prestige based on my prior experiences with them.
My first experience with Prestige was when I needed a car service late night and last minute trying to get to Hale County from Birmingham Airport as my Mama was dying. I texted Prestige from my emergency flight from Mexico and Barry, the owner, was beyond compassionate and professional, and had a great driver waiting on me.
The car was immaculate but more importantly, was there early, and both the owner and driver so sensitive to my situation. The driver told me when we were nearing my Mother's house to just get out and run in and he would bring everything inside, which he did.  I literally do not know if I would have gotten all the way down to my Mother's house that night without Prestige.
I had the same professional experience booking today for my niece's pre wedding events and look forward to using Prestige for the wedding as well. I have traveled all over the world, had my own driver for years in NYC, but have never had a better car service experience.  Thank you Prestige.

name: kristine
text: The Prestige team has driven me more than 60 times this past year and has continued to exceed all my expectations on each trip. Mr. Fields (the owner) and his team are professional, pleasant, courteous, and safe drivers. They arrive on time, are up-to-date on any possible traffic delays with alternate routes ready, and know their client preferences (e.g., unique pick-up or drop-off locations; interior temperature; music, etc.). The team also are cognizant of any flight issues whether going to or leaving the airport. Several of my flights this past year have been delayed and I have been able to text/email/call to reschedule without further delay but in most cases, as soon as I knew of the schedule disruption, I received a text from the driver that they knew of the change already and would be there waiting for me as soon as I landed. Mr. Fields also is a wealth of assistance for transportation needs outside Alabama and has a network of colleagues with whom he can instantly connect you with. For example, when trying to get back to Alabama when a major airline had multiple disruptions and left thousands of travelers stranded in Atlanta, he was able to text within minutes of my request the names and numbers of several local companies who could get me back home. I appreciate this level of consistent service. Such proactive problem-solving and communication put me at ease knowing that my ride would be there – no matter how late the flight would arrive. I have made several last-minute requests (e.g., forgot to reserve a ride; had a game day request) over the year and they were able to accommodate them. The evening before each reservation, I receive an email confirming the pick-up time which is a helpful reminder and an opportunity to make any changes. I also receive a text or call from the driver a few minutes before each pick-up. That way, I know who to expect, if there will be any delays (never have been), or other changes in my reservation. Making a reservation with Prestige is easy to do with drop-down menus on my computer or phone. Also, the Prestige transportation fleet is clean and new with multiple options for any occasion. I have recommended Prestige to my colleagues and friends. Prestige offers an exemplary array of 24/7 services of which I will continue to use – in fact I already have multiple future reservations confirmed. Prestige, Mr. Fields, and his team are a true asset to those who need quality, safe, cost effective, and friendly transportation services.

text:
First off the carriage was amazing and the bride and groom loved it.  I would have given you 5 stars except for one thing.... the driver.  #1, he never got one foot off the carriage to help the bride and her father in or out of the carriage.  I was told beforehand that steps would be provided as I had explained when renting the carriage that the brides father had recently had knee replacement surgery.   #2, the brides father was running late due to unforeseen circumstances, which put everything running late and put the carriage rental past the end time before the carriage had returned the bride and groom to the reception venue.  Your company had my credit card on file and you had been paid well in advance so there was no reason to assume you would not get paid for the extra time, but your driver took it upon himself to start asking guest at the wedding for money.  I was very displeased with his actions.  He sat on the carriage looking like a miserable blown up toad.    I work in the hospitality industry and customer service is as important as the product you are offering.  A+ for the carriage and horse, both amazing!  Customer service needs a lot of improvement.  Your driver did have a very nice tip he would have received, had he not shown such horrible disrespect.  We have rented carriages several times in the past from a different company that has now retired, their service compared to this was worlds apart.  I'm only adding this so that there is no misunderstanding that I was expecting something different from renting a carriage.  I have rented carriages for my wedding and my son's proms, so I am very familiar with the process.
Your driver acted like it was a inconvenience to be there, well trust me, he does not ever have to worry about being at any event I organize or anyone I can warm about him.  He even refused to shake the grooms hand when he tried, just turned his head like he didn't see him.  The video camera captures a lot.

name: Bryan Greenwald
text:
I I had to plan a three day business trip to Birmingham, Alabama.  Having never been there, I was not interested in having to drive between different locations and risk getting lost and being late to meetings.  I found Alabama Sedan on the internet, and reached out to them via email.  Michael called me shortly thereafter and when I explained the various car rides I would require, he was careful to check his calendar to make sure he could accommodate me.
During the trip, Michael was very professional.  He always arrived early- including at the airport, at the hotel, and at the meeting locations.  He was always considerate to text me that he had arrived, but that there was no rush.  And most importantly, he did a great job planning the pickup times that would allow me to arrive at my destination in a timely manner.  There was one trip for which Michael was not available (and for which he had warned me in advance) and the person he arranged as backup was equally professional.
I don’t plan on returning to Birmingham in the near future, but if I do the first thing I will do is arrange to use Alabama Sedan again.  I would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone who needs car transportation in that area.

name: Kurt Blackmon
text: No complaints at all! The vehicle was very clean and the driver Michael was very professional even had a bottle of water waiting on me! Hands down if you need a ride service in Birmingham these are the guys to call!

name: Steven Mccornack
text: The negative review ("they never picked us up and we missed our plane") is FAKE!!!  I have used Alabama Sedan for TWO YEARS now - more than TWO DOZEN TIMES - and EACH and EVERY time they are EARLY!!  Their service is SUPERLATIVE: A+++.   They text me updates for the half-hour before pickup, to ease any possible uncertainty, and text upon their arrival (which averages about 10 minutes early).  Michael and his drivers are friendly, courteous, kind, and helpful, and their vehicles are clean and luxurious.  I use them for ALL my business travel (at least one trip a month), as does my wife, and I have recommended them to numerous colleagues (whose experiences mirror our own).  I also use them for personal travel as well - even in instances where I could just drive to the airport and park - because the experience is so positive.  Over the last two years I have gotten to know Michael well, and he is an honest, dedicated, high-integrity local entrepreneur.  I encourage everyone who needs a lift to the airport - or transport around or out of town in the Birmingham area (e.g., dinner dates out, etc.) - to use his service.  Anyone wishing to verify THIS review as legitimate is more than welcome to contact me - I am Dr. Steven McCornack, and I am a Professor in the Department of Communication Studies at the University of Alabama Birmingham.

resp.text:
Dr. Mccornack

Thank you for the passionate defense of our company. Your loyalty and continued patronage is very appreciated.

Michael Adlesperger
Alabama Sedan
